instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.PP1V05_S0:
What is PP1V05_S0? The PP1V05_S0 power rail is for various components on the logic board that require a 1.05V supply voltage in the S0 (on) state. This voltage rail is likely to be used by the CPU (for VCCIO), PCH (Platform Controller Hub).

.

threads.title: 820 3437, No image
threads.message:
Working on 3437, with a bit humidity!!  

This board initial it's working but without  image. i hear the post sound and the keyboard had a backlight.. 

After inspect the board i noticed <RESISTOR>R5177</RESISTOR> + <RESISTOR>R5178</RESISTOR> bought are corroded! i clean the pads and replace the components! But the problem remained. after a better check on board i found <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR> with a bit off corrusion and i noticed the pin 1 off <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR> not making a contact with the pad because the corrosion! The problem start here!! 

I clean the pads and replace <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR> but after that the machine when i plug the charger the fan only spin 1 time and stop!!! if i remove <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR> the fan always goes but don't work!!! 

i double check <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR> and <RESISTOR>R7612</RESISTOR> bought have a certain values!! No short's! I noticed too when i remove the <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR> i have a unstable voltage on pin1 (2.6 - 2.8V). With <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR> i have 1.8V while the fan works! 

suggestions ? thank you

threads.title: 820 3437, No image
threads.message:
The divider <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR>/12 sets the value of <SIGNAL>PP1V05_S0</SIGNAL>.
So check if get that voltage.

threads.title: 820 3437, No image
threads.message: Ok, already replace <RESISTOR>R7611</RESISTOR>/12 and <CHIP>U7600</CHIP>!! Fan start but stop and don't turn on! it's look's OK! so stupid, i only take the resistor and clean the pad and put it again...

threads.title: 820 3437, No image
threads.message: yes... when i put the charger on megasafe i have <SIGNAL>1V05_S0</SIGNAL> = 1.056V!

threads.title: 820 3437, No image
threads.message:
Board works now?
Check presence of other voltages.

threads.title: 820 3437, No image
threads.message: Now t's working! But only start to work after ultrasonic cleaner!!! After that the machines Start well and show image! so stupid!! but It's working!! thank you one more time
